At Trailside Church, our goal is to…

We are nothing but lost without the sacrifice of Jesus on the cross and His bodily resurrection, defeating death forever. In light of that truth, we seek to love Jesus with everything we are and everything we have. Everything we are flows from this truth: That we worship a risen Savior, the author and creator of our faith, who was and is and is to come. By loving Jesus, we are bound to love his creation.

We love the town of Travelers Rest, and as it grows, so do its needs. We are a church which carries service and community in its DNA- it is not a side project for us, rather it is a way of life. Our eventual goal is to be able to fulfill this along the Swamp Rabbit Trail, by offering a place of rest and rejuvenation for the thousands of people using the trail every week. We do this through purposefully living in relationship.

Simply stated, we do not believe that life is meant to be lived alone. We need each other. We put a priority on not giving up meeting together, both as a worshipping family and in small group settings throughout Travelers Rest and the surrounding areas. By living unified, we can work towards the same goals for the good of the people and community: love and serve the community, live and speak the Gospel, and be unified by our own vulnerabilities and shortcomings so that we can be a people of encouragement to one another, spurring each other on toward making the Gospel known in Travelers Rest, SC.

Join with us

Are you interested in being a part of seeing our vision for Travelers Rest
come to life? We would love to have you with us. If you would like information on
upcoming interest meetings, socials and future small group get-togethers, please
sign up to join our mailing list below. Don’t worry, we
won’t bother you with endless emails!

Give

Trailside can only succeed at its mission as long as our community is serving!
At Trailside we have multiple teams that we would love for you to
be a part of! Click here to let us know you may be called to serve at Trailside.

Malachi 3:10. We are a church that wants to be known for our giving first!
Within this verse in Malachi, we see the only time in scripture
God says to ‘test’ Him. We believe that when we give generously,
God changes lives and eternities. We also want to be
clear that those who give are not giving TO Trailside; we are
giving to God THROUGH Trailside, to accomplish the mission and vision He
has given us for our city. There are multiple
ways for you to Give to God through Trailside:

Give Online
Give a check

309 Wheatfield Ct
Travelers Rest, SC 29690

Give via Text

Text “Give” to 854-888-6503

At Trailside, we believe that God gives every believer with certain gifts
to be used for the service and Glory of God, to bring people closer
to Him. Some of these are outlined in Romans 12:6-8. It is our desire that
 members of Trailside would serve the community by utilizing
these God-given gifts regularly. Email us and we will send
you an assessment, as well as help you to understand your results!
